name: Asti Office Desk
description: Add a minimalist touch to your home office with the Asti desk. Clean lines and slim proportions combine to ensure a timeless, dynamic design that suits every space, no matter your personal style. Crafted with a combination of metal and wood, the Asti desk is the ideal base for a cosy working space. Supported by slim metal legs that are coordinated with the tabletop, it offers a versatile design that will suit any home office space. Available in two different colour variations.
